title: Hextech Key shards.
body:
Hello, folks! I've read the Riot Support article about Hextech Crafting and I have a question about key shards.
I know that I have a chance to get a key shard if I win a game. I want to know if I can get key shard drops if I win with a champion I do not own.

Thanks!

replies.body: Currently, you'll need to play on a champion that you own to receive a key fragment.  I don't have any information if that will be changed in the forseeable future, but that's the current requirement.  Hope that helps!
